content: स्थापनं [स्था-णिच्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} ({%a%}) The act of causing to stand, fixing, founding, establishing, instituting. ({%b%}) Regulating, directing. {@--2@} Fixing the thoughts, concentration of the mind, steady application, abstraction. {@--3@} A dwelling, habitation. {@--4@} A ceremony performed on a woman's perceiving the first signs of living conception; <ab>cf.</ab> पुंसवन.
